Package gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi

Class SunflowShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gewebe.sandbox.sunflowapiapi.SunflowShader
  • public class SunflowShader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the container for sunflow shaders It makes it easyer handling and setting them from processing
